snippet: The close relationship between Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker, and Emily Giske, a well-connected lobbyist, will present a challenge to both women as the 2013 New York City mayor campaign approaches.
abstract: Close and complex relationship between New York City Council speaker Christine C Quinn and well-connected lobbyist Emily Giske presents a challenge to both women as the 2013 New York City mayor campaign approaches; mayoral contender Quinn's bond with Giske is emblematic of her ease working the levers of city politics.

byline.original: By KATE TAYLOR and DAVID W. CHEN

lead_paragraph: The close relationship between Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker, and Emily Giske, a well-connected lobbyist, will present a challenge to both women as the 2013 New York City mayor campaign approaches.

headline.seo: Speaker Quinn’s Friendship With Lobbyist to Pose Test in Mayoral Bid
headline.main: Quinn’s Friendship With Lobbyist May Pose Test in Mayor Bid
headline.print_headline: Quinn’s Friendship With Lobbyist May Pose Test in Mayor Bid
